# Workflow Runner

## Purpose
Executes agentic workflows from JSON configurations and evaluates them using the Code Grading workflow.

## Key Features
- Supports multiple workflow configurations (e.g., end-to-end, defect resolution).
- Integrates with benchmarks infrastructure.
- Multi-agent orchestration loop.

## Usage
- Run a single workflow.
- Run evaluation benchmarks.
- Use the Code Grading workflow as an evaluator.
